Articles.Content: Hi, my names McDethWivFries, I'm a Kerbal Space Program Aholic, this is my 2nd post and i've been off the game for about an hour now...

Welcome to the Forums.

Happy Launching!

From CarolRawley, your #1 supplier of things that will crash, burn, and kill your brain.

Capt'n Skunky, if you can't keep up with me, then you should quit while you're behind ;P
Cheers, altho KSP is worse than ebola (sans the bleeding out every orifice tho), i cant stop launching (and crashing) rockets for the great Kerbalian Empire when i SHOULD be studying for exams :-[
